CHAPTER 884 Hotel Excise Tax

884.01Definitions. 884.02Levy of tax. 884.03Responsibility of hotels. 884.04Use of funds. 884.05Examination of books, papers, etc. 884.99Penalty.

CROSS REFERENCES

Authority to levy - see Ohio R.C. 5739.02(C)
